statement.p: In 32.65 of the last 49 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{49}}={0.3265}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{49}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3265}\cdot{49}={15.9985}. We round that as requested to 16 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
